heading.tnt-trx-ref-value: HOW CAN YOU BE SURE THAT ALL THIS HAS REALLY HAPPENED?

title.heading: PAANO KA MAKATITIYAK NA LAHAT NGANG ITO AY TOTOONG NANGYARI?

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: ...because God has promised, and he can be trusted.

panel.text: ...sapagkat ipinangako ng Diyos, at siya ay maaaring pagkatiwalaan.

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: Thank God often that Jesus is in your life, and that he will never leave you.

panel.text: Pasalamatan ang Diyos na si Hesus ay nasa iyong buhay, at hindi ka niya iiwan.

buttontext.tnt-trx-ref-value: You Have the Spirit of Christ

button.buttontext: Nasa iyo ang Banal na Espiritu

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: You can know that the Spirit of Christ lives in you and that you have eternal life from the moment you invited Jesus into your life, because this is what he has promised.

panel.text: Makatitiyak ka na ang Banal na Espiritu ay namumuhay sa iyo at mayroon kang buhay na walang hanggan mula ng anyayahan mong pumasok si Hesus sa iyong buhay, sapagkat ito ang kanyang ipinangako.

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: And this is what God has testified: He has given us eternal life, and this life is in his Son. Whoever has the Son has life; whoever does not have God's Son does not have life. I have written this to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, so that you may know you have eternal life.

panel.text: At ito ang patotoo: Binigyan tayo ng Diyos ng buhay na walang hanggan at ang buhay na ito ay nasa kaniyang Anak. Ang kinaroroonan ng Anak ay kinaroroonan ng buhay. Siya na hindi kinaroroonan ng Anak ng Diyos ay hindi kinaroroonan ng buhay.Isinulat ko ang mga bagay na ito sa inyo na sumasampalataya sa pangalan ng Anak ng Diyos upang inyong malaman na kayo ay may buhay na walang hanggan.

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: Although feelings are valid and important, they don't determine what is true. A follower of Jesus lives by trusting in the reliability of God himself and what he has said.

panel.text: Bagama't mahalaga ang pakiramdam, hindi ito ang batayan ng katotohanan. Ang tagasunod ni Hesus ay namumuhay sa pagtitiwala sa katapatan ng Diyos at ng kanyang salita.

buttontext.tnt-trx-ref-value: Do Not Depend on How You Feel

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: We rely on God and his promises in the Bible, not our feelings. Feelings are valid and important, but they don't determine what is true. A follower of Jesus lives by trusting in the reliability of God himself and what he has said through his word, the Bible.

panel.text: Umaasa tayo sa Diyos at sakanyang salita mula sa Biblia, hindi sa ating pakiramdam. Ito ay mahalaga ngunit hindo batayan kung ano ang katotohanan. Ang tagasunod ni Hesus ay namumuhay ng may pagtitiwala sa katapatan ng Diyos at sa Kanyang sinabi sapamamagitan ng Kanyang salita sa Bibliya.

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: The train illustrates the connection between fact (God and his word), faith (our trust in God and his word) and feelings (a result of our faith and obedience).

panel.text: Inilalarawan ng tren ang koneksyon ng katotohanan (Diyos at kanyang salita), pananampalataya (ang ating pagtiwala sa Diyos at kanyang salita) at pakiramdam (ang resulta ng ating pananampalataya at pagsunod.)

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: The train will run with or without the guard's van, but it would be useless to attempt to pull the train by the guard's van. In the same way, we can rely on God and what he has said in his word, and not depend on how we feel.

panel.text: Ang tren ay tatakbo kahit wala ang treyler. Subalit ito'y hindi maaaring tumakbo kung treyler ang hihila. Katulad din nito, ang isang Kristiyano na hindi umaasa sa pakiramdam o emosyon, kundi ang pagtitiwala niya ay sa Diyos at sa mga pangako ng Kanyang Salita

question.text: Paano kung hindi ka nakararamdam ng pagkakaiba?
